deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 40 mins

features: Add style and storage to narrow spaces with this slim floor cabinet, featuring a mirrored doorknob and inset beadboard styling.
Slim design slides effortlessly into tight bathrooms, laundry rooms or other compact spaces, while being deep enough to hold a variety of items.
Interior features two adjustable and one fixed bottom shelf for concealing toiletries, towels, candles, soaps and other bathroom necessities.
Anchors to wall for added stability.
body.description: Add style and storage to narrow spaces with this slim floor cabinet, featuring a mirrored doorknob and inset beadboard styling. Slim design slides effortlessly into tight bathrooms, laundry rooms or other compact spaces, while being deep enough to hold a variety of items. Interior features two adjustable and one fixed bottom shelf for concealing toiletries, towels, candles, soaps and other bathroom necessities. Anchors to wall for added stability and safety. Revamp the entire bathroom with additional RiverRidge Ashland Collection items. Additional dimensions: Overall Cabinet Interior: 12.19-in. D x 8.81-in. W x 28.25-in. H; Interior Shelf #1: 12.19-in. D x 8.81-in. W x 8.75-in. H; Interior Shelf #2: 12.19-in. D x 8.81-in. W x 9.75-in. H; Interior Shelf#3: 12.19-in. D x 8.81-in. W x 9-in. H; Adjustable Shelves Height Range: 7.75-in. - 10.25-in. Assembled dimensions: 13.5L x 11W x 32H inches.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Complete the look with products from our Ashland Collection! Elevate your home with the Ashland Collection and enjoy the beauty of beadboard design, smart storage solutions, and a range of color options to suit your individual style. These pieces offer the best of both worlds, helping you stay organized without compromising on style. Our Ashland Collection features concealed storage, allowing you to keep your belongings neatly tucked away, while display shelves provide a showcase for your favorite decorations and easily accessible items. With practical and versatile storage features, such as towel bars and easy-slide drawers, you'll find this collection to be both convenient and stylish. Plus, Ashland furniture pieces are available in multiple colors and are family-friendly, specifically built with adjustable anti-tip wall mounts for added stability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased by the completed project. Instructions were fairly easy to follow, but a couple of the steps were out of order and/or we're missing. I put this together with my sister fairly easily. The finished cabinet is very sturdy and looks as good as the picture. Not quite as roomy as I would've liked but I needed it for a tight space and it fits perfectly and is good quality. I would buy other furniture from River Ridge if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: arrived in good shape and packed very secure. easy to put together and ends up more sturdy than expected for the cost. obviously it has its limitations in size and dimensions but is sturdy and clean design .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect addition to a small bathroom
reviews.reviewText: I needed a narrow yet functional cabinet to fill an otherwise useless space in my very small bathroom, and this cabinet was as close as I was going to get without getting something custom made! It took me about 30 minutes to assemble and it looks exactly as I expected. The magnetic closure actually works and the shelves can move around to fit your needs. For the price point, I am very happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cabinet is great and goes together easily
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for the small space I needed it for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Seams don't exactly line up but it matches a cabinet I bought elsewhere. Fits in my smaller bathroom. Extra storage for bath tissue, soap etc. A bit pricey but nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love was tine consuming to built put is very sturdy. We like it very much, thank you!Highly recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I really like it the quality. I gave it 3 stars because the measurements are incorrect. The depth and width are backwards. The information states 11"D x 13.5"W x 32"H. It should be 13"Deep x 11"Wide x 32"H. That two inches made a difference in my small bathroom, which it what i bought it for. 11" inches deep would have fit. Now I need to find another place for it. Unfortunately, in my eyes, waste of money. The supplier still made money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great looking cabinet
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size to keep in my kitchen for towels and wash cloths
